review: Nearly perfect!  Amazing how this little device works so well to make any TV a smart TV.  One of my favorite features is the search.  You search for a movie and it will tell you all the vendors who offer it and the price of it on each.  I was surprised to find differences and happy to save money choosing a provider I might not have considered.  If I could have one more feature, If it could be programmable to learn the volume buttons on the TV, it would be perfect.  As it is you need one remote to control the Roku stick and another to control the TV volume.
author: Joe Pires

review: I purchased this for my parents when they moved because they couldn't find their Roku 3. It works, but the one problem they kept having was that the remote kept disconnecting from the Roku Stick. We tried all kinds of things to get it to stay paired, but it wouldn't. They found their Roku 3, and this went back in the box.
